posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
This is a spell-sword that maybe doesn't have the raw power of his (dragonic) brethren but gains in other areas, that typically most spell-swords have troubles. He is a Sorcerer first and foremost which means he is flexible and i made sure he has all the metamagic feats you may want, in order to make the most out of it. Secondly he has a synergy with CoT, that not only boosts his saving throws to very good levels but also gives him a one-time-bomb (Divine wrath) that he is going to use when the situation demands it with substantial bonuses. I intentionally kept the level spread pre-epic like this in order to be able to take all ten CoT levels, or else i would end up with a (Ftr 6/ CoT 8) spread that would lessen both my Saving throws and Divine wrath bonuses by two across the spectrum. Fighter is here for obvious reasons, not only it gives Ews but the Heavy armour as well and another feat of your choice. Moreover it allows us to have a melee build all set-up from as soon as lvl two. So, early playability, spell flexibility, good saving throws and a Divine wrath bomb for when you need it are what constitute this build, good hunting!

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
It's tougher than it looks Dark Knight, as you noticed already all the spell-related feats are in general feat slots and toughness pretty much requires the same so the shuffling we can do is limited. You can however switch places with the bonus feats just fine. At 20th lvl where i have the ( / ) is either one or the other not both, i should have clarified that better, typically i would pick power attack for when you need extra damage against foes with many hit points but poor armour class like dire animals or giants.

Here is also the only other build like this, done by gdl, the august spell-blade --> http://home.comcast.net/~worldofgreyhaw ... 00792.html

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
A nice spellsword you have here, with a welcome boost from Divine wrath. The fighter/CoT levels cure the feat starvation that many sorcerer builds suffer from. F4/CoT10 Level split is better than F14 and even CoT14. The saves are fine too.
I like it! :)
